title: Sunny Family Home with Home Office & EV Charging in Historic Mokotów
description: Step into this spacious 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom home tucked away in one of Mokotów’s most sought-after and family-friendly streets. With approximately 180 sqm of comfortable, flexible living space, this house offers bright, open-plan common areas and generously sized bedrooms ideal for growing families or homeowners seeking work-life balance. Enjoy the advantages of a newly renovated home office, a sizeable fenced yard perfect for children and pets, plus your own EV charging station, designed to make future-focused living easy and efficient.
neighborhood_description: Located in historic Mokotów, you’ll find yourself in the heart of Warsaw’s charm—an area renowned for its tree-lined boulevards, beautiful parks, and excellent schools. All daily conveniences are close at hand: trendy cafés, delicious bakeries, shopping malls, and artisan shops are an easy stroll or ride away. The neighborhood is considered extremely safe, boasts rich architectural heritage, and offers seamless connections to the city center via public transport, highways, or even quick trips to Chopin Airport.
key_features: shopping and dining within walking distance
lifestyle_benefits: family-friendly layout with secure outdoor space
flexible home office—ideal for entrepreneurs or remote work
vibrant local café and dining scene
historic yet modern and technology-ready neighborhood
target_buyer: Perfect for entrepreneurial families, remote-working professionals, or executives seeking a luxurious, quiet home with business-ready amenities, high walkability, and quick commuting options.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a modern family retreat in one of Warsaw’s most desirable districts, merging classic district charm with the convenience of next-generation smart home additions. It offers excellent long-term value amidst a competitive Mokotów market.
